phrs.translation: 文本化和对象化的东方

sentences.sentence: Since the image of Faust was first textualized, it has entered a process of constant and repeated description and dynamic construction from the perspective of Neo-historicist theory.
sentences.translation: 浮士德形象自文本化以来，按照新历史主义的理论规约，就已进入了不断修撰和反复描述的动态建构之中。
